snippet: The Philae lander performed two tricky maneuvers on Friday: drilling into the comet’s rocky surface and rotating itself to try to catch more sunlight to recharge its batteries.
abstract: Spacecraft Philae lander, which made history by touching down on a comet, drills into the rocky surface and rotates itself to catch more essential sunlight, both risky but critical maneuvers to keep mission alive.
lead_paragraph: The Philae lander performed two tricky maneuvers on Friday: drilling into the comet’s rocky surface and rotating itself to try to catch more sunlight to recharge its batteries.

headline.main: Spacecraft on Comet Drills for Data as Its Power Fades
headline.print_headline: Spacecraft on Comet Drills for Data as Its Power Fades
